alert.note: Alert for Linn (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 01 at 8:21AM CDT until June 05 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kansas...Missouri... Marais Des Cygnes River at La Cygne affecting Linn KS County. Marais Des Cygnes River near Trading Post affecting Bates and Linn KS Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kansas... Marais Des Cygnes River at Osawatomie affecting Miami County. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/kc/. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Marais Des Cygnes River near Trading Post. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 27.0 feet, Flooding of low-lying farmland occurs and water begins to approach Stateline Road north of the river gauge. At 29.0 feet, Stateline Road is flooded north of the river gauge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 23.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 32.6 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Obs Forecasts Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri 1pm 1pm 1pm Marais Des Cygnes River Trading Post 27.0 23.2 Wed 8am 26.4 32.6 31.0 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
